name: SEER Regional Nodes
title: SEER Regional Nodes
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in SEER Mets.

**Note 2:**  Hepatoduodenal nodes are regional for primaries of the lesser curvature of the stomach (C165).  They are coded in SEER Mets for all other subsites in this schema.
footnotes:
\### Considered distant in Historic Stage
\*** Considered distant in 1977 Summary Staging Guide
